column5: well it happened again...  i have a walleye tournament today... take off at 7:00am...  been awake since 2:00am...  :wallbash:  i get myself so worked up for fishing....  and im stressing out because i havent been able to fish hardly at all this season because of my motor issues... so im kinda fishing blind... and the walleye are in transition from spring to summer locations... so the jig bite has slowed right down but the crank bite isnt hot yet...  my brother is on some quality fish so thats the pattern we are gunna start with... then mid day we are gunna hit my summer milk run looking for a few good fish...  according to previous years this tourny doesnt get big weights... the past 3 years were 12lbs 12lbs and 15lbs that won with a 3 walleye bag... and most boats dont break 10lbs...so all we need is a 4 pound average to be near the top...  thursday afternnon my brother got a 4lb and 7lb walleye so our hopes are high...  anyways... just killing time watching American Dad and reading some threads...  wish me luck today...

Good luck Mike!  I am not even fishing a tourney....i'm heading out for crappie and walleye with my buddy Cliff for an early session and i'm at at 3:30am!  Gonna clean the bathroom and sweep/mop whole house and get laundry folded......BROWNIE POINTS...that will increase if i get home with a limit of fishes....if i can do that i should be in 1st Place for today
Good luck today Mike, hope you nail a couple bigguns.
did all my chores yesterday... wanted to make sure i had the extra free time after the tourny for celebration(hopefully)...lol
thanks Lew... i sure could use the money to pay for my outboard repairs...
Good lucky Mike , i;d like to stick around and chat but the trucks running out side for my fishing date at 5 . Nock'em dead .
Good luck out there today mike
Good luck.
Even though you're fishing by now, good luck!
hope all went well! I have the same problem everytime I go fishing...can't sleep. I guess its a good thing I only get out 10 times a year!
I can see i"m draggin my Butt this mornin.Good luck Mike and Chris !!!! Geesh....what is everyone doing up at 4.30 in the blessed a.m.????
By 4:30 I'm already thinking about lunch
Well i know you're fishing but good luck.
I know about "Lew" o'clock !!!
Good luck out on the water today MM!  I'm sure you'll do just fine

Good luck Mike, the reasons you listed are the reasons I quit fishing tournies, the stress of pre-fishin, the night before etc, took away the enjoyment, plus the egos, and the cheaters looking to either get sponsors, or pleasing sponsors.
Good luck!  Let us know how you do!
Good luck! I can't sleep the night before any fishing trip, I don't think my system could handle competative fishing.
Took 6th out of 24 teams...  Here's the weights 3 fish bags  16.09 14.09 14.01 13.14 12.00 And we had 10lb 6oz    Big fish 9.02 7.08

Nice haul, nothing wrong with that. I hear ya about not being able to sleep, happens to me all the time. Next weekend I'm in a "tourny" (just 20-30 guys pooling money together for whoever catches the biggest fish) and I know I won't sleep well the night before, and that's not even a real tournament lol.
Good show Mike  6th out of 24 is pretty darn good
Good job Mike! I also had a walleye tourney today on a popular Kawartha lake. Bucktail in think pond weed edge killed it! Finish 3rd, tricky to fish with the slot size limit.  All the best!
Atta boy Mike & well done !!
Waiting for a call from my stepson, I think he was in the same tournament as you Mike, Quinte I believe. Way to go
